service.name: "Attribute Management"
service.tagline: "Manage community membership and expose trusted information"
service.description: "This service allows you to manage user membership, where users can register and ask to be part of a Virtual Organisation, and where the VO supervisor can approve or remove users from the VO within EGI. The service is a third party service that can be queried by service providers to decide on user authorization."
service.userValue: "Easy and trusted way to manage Virtual Organization membership."
service.userBase: "All users registered in EGI Virtual Organisations, All VO managers"
service.funding: "Development: EC H2020 projects (primarily) and national projects/open source projects. Operations: EGI participant fees + in-kind contribution from service providers"
